posts.post_content:
I have the following lot of T206's for sale: $225 SOLD as of 3-7

Scans available upon request on fronts and backs.

Abstein PD 350                      Mis-cut/possible trim on bottom
Bridwell PD 350-460 25.          Crease and paper loss on rear
Bridwell portrait SC 150.          Crease in center
Burch batting PD 150.             Left corner crease/possible trimming
Conroy batting PD 150.           Crease and faint pen mark
Dougherty hand in air PD 350.  Nice with faint pen mark
Downey batting OM.                Crease rear paper loss
Hahn SC 350.                        Crease in center
Howell portrait PD 350.            Crease in center and faint pen mark
Konetchy glove above PD 150.   No creases and no pen marks
Lake with ball SC 350-460.       No creases but same faint pen mark
Lindaman PD 150.                   Crease in center 
Lord PD 350.                          No creases with faint pen mark
Mitchell PD 350.                      Multiple creases
Natress PD 350.                       Minor bottom left corner crease
Schulte back view PD 350-460 25. Mis-cut and top right corner crease
Happy Smith OM.                      Creases and rear paper loss
Stahl glove shows PD 350.         Center crease and paper loss

Please clarify whether or not these have been sold.

If not, I'd like to see scans; mail to [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url].

Thanks.
